title: What are five examples of underdevelopment technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Originally Answered: What are some examples of underdeveloped technology? The paper clip, fingernail/toenail clipper, the fork, the magnifying glass in the Swiss Army Knife, Dog training to poop and pee in the toilet, and forgetting to flush. Aug 29, 2013 · Perfection of this technology could result in the p
They say a picture is worth a thousand words, and so, here are my thousand word's worth. Furthermore, as I am feeling generous today, I am giving an extra example of that underdeveloped technology.
The square wheel, Helicopter ejector seat. Waterproof teabags, Solar powered torches, The impact activated parachute. All these need further development.
